notes: In order to spawn Horestis, a team has to break all the [[Ornate Canopic Jar]]s in Horestis' tomb.
sounds: I might be dead but I'm not gone!
name: Horestis
strategy:
All vocations should wear a [[Dwarven Ring]] to avoid the [[Drunkenness]] he causes. 

There is a spot in the upper left portion of the room where only 2 creatures can attack you at a time.  Like this:  [[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=adOxyU7397Q&list=PLAO4znVdU3qR8BxHiXX9QMaHLqC2eTEQs&index=7 97 EK Killing Horestis]] 

Mages: He is weak to fire so you should use [[Great Fireball Rune]]s and [[Flame Strike]]. If you think it's attacks are too much for you, use [[Magic Shield]] and a [[Fire Wall Rune]] to keep your distance.
